attributes.action: Create MP's to represent British Subjects who live outside of the British Isles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are a huge amount of people who live outside of the country sometimes for extended periods and need representation in the Parliament.  Italy has lead the way on this issue by creating such posts for the first time in their national elections.  It would be a great way for Brits who live overseas to participate in home affairs and have a voice which would speak for their interests.  There could be perhaps 4 posts created for America, Europe, Africa and Asia.
